metrics.name: DatabaseConnections
metrics.documentation: The number of database connections in use.

metrics.name: Deadlocks
metrics.documentation: The average number of deadlocks in the database per second.

metrics.name: EngineUptime
metrics.documentation: The amount of time that the instance has been running, in seconds.

metrics.name: FreeableMemory
metrics.documentation: The amount of available random access memory, in bytes.

metrics.name: FreeLocalStorage
metrics.documentation: The amount of local storage available, in bytes.

metrics.name: NetworkReceiveThroughput
metrics.documentation: The amount of network throughput received from clients by each instance, in bytes per second.

metrics.name: NetworkThroughput
metrics.documentation: The amount of network throughput both received from and transmitted to clients by each instance, in bytes per second.

metrics.name: NetworkTransmitThroughput
metrics.documentation: The amount of network throughput sent to clients by each instance, in bytes per second.

metrics.name: SnapshotStorageUsed
metrics.documentation: The total amount of backup storage in bytes consumed by all Aurora snapshots outside its backup retention window.

metrics.name: TotalBackupStorageBilled
metrics.documentation: The total amount of backup storage in bytes for which you are billed.

metrics.name: VolumeBytesUsed
metrics.documentation: The amount of storage used by your Aurora DB instance, in bytes.

metrics.name: VolumeReadIOPs
metrics.documentation: The number of billed read I/O operations from a cluster volume, reported at 5-minute intervals.

metrics.name: VolumeWriteIOPs
metrics.documentation: The number of write disk I/O operations to the cluster volume, reported at 5-minute intervals.
